column1: computed/computerized tomography check of 57-year-old man without comorbidity and relevant risk factors,
hospitalized for over 30 days in Intensive Care currently in IOT with alternate mechanical ventilation SIMV-CPAP and in therapy with antiretrovirals, Tocilizumab, Cortisone, Cephalosporin, ebpm.
Evolution of acute inflammatory lung damage in fibrotic structural modifications of the parenchyma with honeycombing-like pattern.
Immune-mediated inflammatory damage + mechanical ventilation-induced barotrauma damage? Reversible or irreversible?

Chest computed/computerized tomography will assume a further strategic role in understanding covid pathology by studying, with the help of the clinic and specific pneumological tests, any lung changes in patients recovered from severe pneumonia.
